page.title: 14LLANGURIG, LIFE STYLES
page.content: There is no real social life in the village. There seems to be those who enjoy a drink, and those who do not. There is no choice for young people - no youth club, no societies, other than the Y.F.C. Discos are held in Llanidloes. The nearest theatre is in Newtown. Some local people are involved in singing in choirs in Rhayader. Some are concert soloists. The majority of the inhabitants are musical, but do little about it. Clothes fashions are very reserved even among the young. Very few people gamble, but there is a betting shop in Llanidloes. Generally life is quiet and unaffected by national cultural trends. There are no coloured people.
